pages.title: About Me
pages.content: Since 5+ year accomplished web design & front-end development with extensive experience building E-Commerce driven websites using open source and enterprise technologies, HTML5, CSS3 and various web scripting technologies, web standards and project management. Provide a diverse range of services including custom theme/application/plugin development and branding to an array of clients from a variety of industries. Enthusiastic web professional motivated by challenging projects and deadlines.
